#define LUSTRE_ROOT_FID_SEQ   0

By design including kmem.h overrides the Linux slab interfaces to provide the Illumos kmem cache interfaces.

To override this and gain access to the Linux interfaces these preprocessor macros must be undefined.

Definition at line 80 of file osd_internal.h.
